room_title: Escape room "The Illusionist" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
room_address: 44325 W 12 Mile Ste H175 Novi, MI 48377
room_description: The Illusionist is returning to the main stage. He defies reality in order to disorient you and your friends before he makes you a part of his final trick. You must solve riddles and complete various puzzles within sixty minutes or it’s too late… Will you and your friends be able to defeat the Illusionist and escape the show?
